metadata.synopsis: Random dwarf female complains about crime in the city. Her husband was beaten up recently. Reacts to player's current health and relates to them if hurt.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_A, LOW, teleport to S_LOW_Prison_Door_TeleportTo_6be6fb14-3920-4765-b2db-ce2f34b5246b, talk to the female dwarf NPC

1.speaker: Bruha Oakhide
1.text: We're too poor to leave. But too scared to stay - like half the city.

3.speaker: Bruha Oakhide
3.text: The thugs are getting bolder. My husband's been mugged twice this month, if you can believe it.

0.speaker: Bruha Oakhide
0.text: Oh darling - you've been hurt too? Shame what this city's come to.

2.speaker: Bruha Oakhide
2.text: You be safe out there. Can't trust a damn soul.
